featured.text: Which of the following statements can be supported by the passage? (A) A robot was designed to let humans decrease their productivity.
But photos showing outdoor activities, such as sailing on a sunny day or walking in the woods, can greatly distract workers and thus 30 their productivity.
Only 4 percent of employers said that casual dress has a negative impact on productivity.
26 , many people believe that bad weather can reduce productivity and efficiency.

definition.zh_def: 生產力，指在一定時間內生產的產品或服務的數量和效率。
definition.en_def: The effectiveness of productive effort, measured in terms of the rate of output per unit of input.
definition.example: Improving productivity can lead to higher profits for the company.
